name: rotate-number
tagline: A simple jQuery plugin to create animations of digital number rotation. Compatible with Zepto.
body:
Rotate number plugin ================= A simple jQuery plugin to create animations of digital number rotation. Compatible with Zepto. Example --------------------- ### HTML Snippet ###### ```html
``` ### Javascript ###### ```javascript $("#rotate").rotateNumber({digits: 5}); ``` ### CSS ###### ```css #rotate { font-family: Arial; } #rotate .digit { width: 30px; } ``` Options ---------------------
OptionDescriptionDefault
digitsNumber of the digits3
digitSizeFont size of the digits50
rotateDurationDuration of the rotate animation0.6 (s)
